title: Cant connect to League at school
body: How can i connect to League at my college? I have a 3 hour break in between classes and i finished all of my hw and just want to play some league. It says i can not connect to the network. Please help!

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be some restrictions on your local network that are preventing your client from connecting to the server. I recommend reaching out to your College's *Network Administrator* to see what configurations they can make for you to connect.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qRvPc9W9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-07T20:24:52.984+0000)
>
> It sounds like there may be some restrictions on your local network that are preventing your client from connecting to the server. I recommend reaching out to your College's *Network Administrator* to see what configurations they can make for you to connect.

> Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank You
